SageTVPlugin.Name: Commercial Detector UI
SageTVPlugin.Description: Alters the behavior of the Comskip Playback UI Mod so the "Run Comskip" buttons are compatible with the CommercialDetector plugin.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 1.33.1: -Move to V9 repository
Version 1.33:
- Updates by JREkiwi to accomodate comskip_playback 2.1.2. Thanks John.
Version 1.32:
- Migrated hosting to BinTray. No change in functionality.
Version 1.31:
- Fixed bug that caused CS icon in header to only be displayed if another header icon also needed to be displayed.
Version 1.30:
- Added option in the ComskipPlayback setup to jump to the CommercialDetector setup.
Version 1.20:
- Comskip icon in header now works for SageClients.
- Different color comskip icon next to show being processed now works for SageClients.
- Manually running comskip now works from SageClients.
- Made CommercialDetector 0.70 minimum required version to force update that includes bug fixes.
Version 1.10:
- Show comskip icon in header if active.
- Change color of comskip icon next to show that is being processed.
- Changed min Comskip Playback STVi requirement to 2.0.5.
Version 1.00 - Initial release.
